role.label: Name Change Event Date [Axis]
role.documentation: For a sequence of name change event related facts, use this typed dimension to distinguish them.  The axis members are restricted to be a valid for xml schema 'date' or 'datetime' data type.

role.label: Entity Voluntary Filers
role.documentation: Indicate 'Yes' or 'No' if the registrant is not required to file reports pursuant to Section 13 or Section 15(d) of the Act.

role.label: Exchange [Domain]
role.documentation: The set of all exchanges. MIC exchange codes are drawn from ISO 10383.

role.label: Entity Reporting Currency ISO Code
role.documentation: The three character ISO 4217 code for the currency used for reporting purposes. Example: 'USD'.

role.label: Soliciting Material
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true when the Form 8-K filing is intended to satisfy the filing obligation of the registrant as soliciting material pursuant to Rule 14a-12 under the Exchange Act.

role.label: Document Shell Company Report
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true for a Shell Company Report pursuant to section 13 or 15(d) of the Exchange Act.

role.label: Entity Incorporation, Date of Incorporation
role.documentation: Date when an entity was incorporated

role.label: Entity Listings [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Title of 12(b) Security
role.documentation: Title of a 12(b) registered security.

role.label: Entity Current Reporting Status
role.documentation: Indicate 'Yes' or 'No' whether registrants (1) have filed all reports required to be filed by Section 13 or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 during the preceding 12 months (or for such shorter period that registrants were required to file such reports), and (2) have been subject to such filing requirements for the past 90 days. This information should be based on the registrant's current or most recent filing containing the related disclosure.

role.label: Entity Addresses [Table]
role.documentation: Container of address information for the entity

role.label: Entity Shell Company
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true when the registrant is a shell company as defined in Rule 12b-2 of the Exchange Act.

role.label: Approximate Date of Commencement of Proposed Sale to Public
role.documentation: The approximate date of a commencement of a proposed sale of securities to the public. This element is disclosed in S-1, S-3, S-4, S-11, F-1, F-3 and F-10 filings.

role.label: Entity Addresses, Address Type [Axis]
role.documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

role.label: Name Change Event [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent concepts included in a table. Name change event line item concepts are used for information qualified by domain members of axes in the Name Change Event table.

role.label: Document Period Start Date
role.documentation: The start date of the period covered in the document, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

role.label: Documents Incorporated by Reference [Text Block]
role.documentation: Documents incorporated by reference.

role.label: Address Type [Domain]
role.documentation: An entity may have several addresses for different purposes and this domain represents all such types.

role.label: No Trading Symbol Flag
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true only for a security having no trading symbol.

role.label: Registration Statement Amendment Number
role.documentation: Amendment number to registration statement under the Investment Company Act of 1940.

role.label: Dividend or Interest Reinvestment Plan Only
Entity Filer Category
role.documentation: Indicate whether the registrant is one of the following: Large Accelerated Filer, Accelerated Filer, Non-accelerated Filer. Definitions of these categories are stated in Rule 12b-2 of the Exchange Act. This information should be based on the registrant's current or most recent filing containing the related disclosure.

role.label: Trading Symbol
role.documentation: Trading symbol of an instrument as listed on an exchange.

role.label: Document Information [Text Block]
role.documentation: Container to support the formal attachment of each official or unofficial, public or private document as part of a submission package.

role.label: Entity Small Business
role.documentation: Indicates that the company is a Smaller Reporting Company (SRC).

role.label: Entity [Text Block]
role.documentation: Container to serve as parent of six Entity related Table concepts.

role.label: Business Contact [Member]
role.documentation: Business contact for the entity

role.label: Security Exchange Name
role.documentation: Name of the Exchange on which a security is registered.

role.label: Title of 12(g) Security
role.documentation: Title of a 12(g) registered security.

role.label: Entity Emerging Growth Company
role.documentation: Indicate if registrant meets the emerging growth company criteria.

role.label: Former Address [Member]
role.documentation: Former address for entity

role.label: Entity Ex Transition Period
role.documentation: Indicate if an emerging growth company has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards.

role.label: Other Address [Member]
role.documentation: Other address for entity

role.label: Security Reporting Obligation
role.documentation: 15(d), indicating whether the security has a reporting obligation under that section of the Exchange Act.

role.label: Document Registration Statement
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true only for a form used as a registration statement.

role.label: Document Transition Report
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true only for a form used as a transition report.

role.label: Pre-commencement Tender Offer
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true when the Form 8-K filing is intended to satisfy the filing obligation of the registrant as pre-commencement communications pursuant to Rule 14d-2(b) under the Exchange Act.

role.label: Document Accounting Standard
role.documentation: The basis of accounting the registrant has used to prepare the financial statements included in this filing This can either be 'U.S. GAAP', 'International Financial Reporting Standards', or 'Other'.

role.label: Entity Public Float
role.documentation: The aggregate market value of the voting and non-voting common equity held by non-affiliates computed by reference to the price at which the common equity was last sold, or the average bid and asked price of such common equity, as of the last business day of the registrant's most recently completed second fiscal quarter.

role.label: Entity Addresses [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Entity Listing, Par Value Per Share
role.documentation: The par value per share of security quoted in same currency as Trading currency. Example: '0.01'.

role.label: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding
role.documentation: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.
The country in which the entity is incorporated.

role.label: Entity Information, Former Legal or Registered Name
role.documentation: Former Legal or Registered Name of an entity

role.label: Entity Interactive Data Current
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true when the registrant has submitted electronically every Interactive Data File required to be submitted pursuant to Rule 405 of Regulation S-T during the preceding 12 months (or for such shorter period that the registrant was required to submit such files).

role.label: Entity Address, Address Description
role.documentation: Description of the kind of address for the entity, if needed to distinguish more finely among mailing, principal, legal, accounting, contact or other addresses.

role.label: Entity Listing, Foreign
role.documentation: Yes or No value indicating whether this is a listing that is a foreign listing or depository receipt.

role.label: Other Reporting Standard Item Number
role.documentation: "Item 17" or "Item 18" specified when the basis of accounting is neither US GAAP nor IFRS.

role.label: Legal Entity Identifier
role.documentation: A globally unique ISO 17442 value to identify entities, commonly abbreviated as LEI.

role.label: Entity Contact Personnel [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Entity Listing, Primary
role.documentation: Yes or No value indicating whether a listing of an instrument on an exchange is primary for the entity.

role.label: Document Shell Company Event Date
role.documentation: Date of event requiring a shell company report.

role.label: Entity Inv Company Type
role.documentation: One of: N-1A (Mutual Fund), N-1 (Open-End Separate Account with No Variable Annuities), N-2 (Closed-End Investment Company), N-3 (Separate Account Registered as Open-End Management Investment Company), N-4 (Variable Annuity UIT Separate Account), N-5 (Small Business Investment Company), N-6 (Variable Life UIT Separate Account), S-1 or S-3 (Face Amount Certificate Company), S-6 (UIT, Non-Insurance Product).

role.label: Contact Personnel Name
role.documentation: Name of contact personnel

role.label: Amendment Description
role.documentation: Description of changes contained within amended document.

role.label: Document Quarterly Report
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true only for a form used as an quarterly report.

role.label: Entity Listing, Depository Receipt Ratio
role.documentation: The number of underlying shares represented by one American Depository Receipt (ADR) or Global Depository Receipt (GDR). A value of '3' means that one ADR represents 3 underlying shares. If one underlying share represents 2 ADR's then the value would be represented as '0.5'.

role.label: Entity Legal Form
role.documentation: The details of the entity's legal form. Examples are partnership, limited liability company, trust, etc.

role.label: Entity Listing, Security Trading Currency
role.documentation: The three character ISO 4217 code for the currency in which the security is quoted. Example: 'USD'

role.label: Contact Personnel Email Address
role.documentation: Email address of contact personnel.

role.label: Entity Home Country ISO Code
role.documentation: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code for the Entity's home country. If home country is different from country of legal incorporation, then also provide country of legal incorporation in the 'Entity Incorporation, State Country Code' element.

role.label: Contact Personnel Fax Number
role.documentation: Fax Number of contact personnel.

role.label: Entity Listing, Description
role.documentation: Description of the kind of listing the entity has on the exchange, if necessary to further describe different instruments that are already distinguished by Entity, Exchange and Security.

role.label: Audited Annual Financial Statements
role.documentation: Boolean flag with value true on a form if it is an annual report containing audited financial statements.

role.label: Parent Entity Legal Name
role.documentation: If the entity which the financial information concerns is a subsidiary of another company, then provide to full legal name of the parent entity

role.label: Name Change Event [Table]
role.documentation: For a set of related facts in a sequence of name change events, use this table when the events occurred within a single reporting period.

role.label: Entity Address, Address Line One
role.documentation: Address Line 1 such as Attn, Building Name, Street Name

role.label: Written Communications
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true when the Form 8-K filing is intended to satisfy the filing obligation of the registrant as written communications pursuant to Rule 425 under the Securities Act.

role.label: Legal Entity [Axis]
role.documentation: The set of legal entities associated with a report.

role.label: Entity Registrant Name
role.documentation: The exact name of the entity filing the report as specified in its charter, which is required by forms filed with the SEC.

role.label: Entity Address, Address Line Two
role.documentation: Address Line 2 such as Street or Suite number

role.label: Document Type
role.documentation: The type of document being provided (such as 10-K, 10-Q, 485BPOS, etc). The document type is limited to the same value as the supporting SEC submission type, or the word 'Other'.

role.label: Entity [Domain]
role.documentation: All the names of the entities being reported upon in a document. Any legal structure used to conduct activities or to hold assets. Some examples of such structures are corporations, partnerships, limited liability companies, grantor trusts, and other trusts. This item does not include business and geographical segments which are included in the geographical or business segments domains.

role.label: Annual Information Form
role.documentation: Boolean flag with value true on a form if it is an annual report containing an annual information form.

role.label: New Effective Date for Previous Filing
Entity Information [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Document Annual Report
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true only for a form used as an annual report.

role.label: Entity Address, Address Line Three
role.documentation: Address Line 3 such as an Office Park

role.label: Document Information [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Entity Address, City or Town
role.documentation: Name of the City or Town

role.label: Document Description
role.documentation: The description of the document.

role.label: Entity Central Index Key
role.documentation: A unique 10-digit SEC-issued value to identify entities that have filed disclosures with the SEC. It is commonly abbreviated as CIK.

role.label: Post-Effective Amendment Number
role.documentation: Amendment number to registration statement under the Securities Act of 1933 after the registration becomes effective.

role.label: Entity Address, State or Province
role.documentation: Name of the state or province.

role.label: Document Creation Date
role.documentation: The date the document was made available and submitted, in YYYY-MM-DD format. The date of submission, date of acceptance by the recipient, and the document effective date are all potentially different.

role.label: Entity File Number
role.documentation: Commission file number. The field allows up to 17 characters. The prefix may contain 1-3 digits, the sequence number may contain 1-8 digits, the optional suffix may contain 1-4 characters, and the fields are separated with a hyphen.

role.label: Entity Address, Country
role.documentation: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.

role.label: Auditor Firm ID
role.documentation: PCAOB issued Audit Firm Identifier

role.label: Document Effective Date
role.documentation: The date when a document, upon receipt and acceptance, becomes officially effective, in YYYY-MM-DD format. Usually it is a system-assigned date time value, but it may be declared by the submitter in some cases.

role.label: Entity Primary SIC Number
role.documentation: Primary Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) Number for the Entity.

role.label: Entity Address, Postal Zip Code
role.documentation: Code for the postal or zip code

role.label: Document [Domain]
role.documentation: Type of the document as assigned by the filer, corresponding to SEC document naming convention standards.

role.label: Document Period End Date
role.documentation: For the EDGAR submission types of Form 8-K: the date of the report, the date of the earliest event reported; for the EDGAR submission types of Form N-1A: the filing date; for all other submission types: the end of the reporting or transition period.  The format of the date is YYYY-MM-DD.

role.label: Document Information, Document [Axis]
role.documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

role.label: Entity Phone Fax Numbers [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Phone Fax Number Description
role.documentation: Description of Phone or Fax Number

role.label: Entity Tax Identification Number
role.documentation: The Tax Identification Number (TIN), also known as an Employer Identification Number (EIN), is a unique 9-digit value assigned by the IRS.

role.label: Pre-commencement Issuer Tender Offer
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true when the Form 8-K filing is intended to satisfy the filing obligation of the registrant as pre-commencement communications pursuant to Rule 13e-4(c) under the Exchange Act.

role.label: Document Version
role.documentation: The version identifier of the document.

role.label: Entity Accounting Standard
role.documentation: The standardized abbreviation of the accounting standard used by the entity. This can either be US GAAP as promulgated by the FASB or IFRS as promulgated by the IASB. Example: 'US GAAP', 'IFRS'.  This is distinct from the Document Accounting Standard element.

role.label: Document Fiscal Period Focus
role.documentation: Fiscal period values are FY, Q1, Q2, and Q3.  1st, 2nd and 3rd quarter 10-Q or 10-QT statements have value Q1, Q2, and Q3 respectively, with 10-K, 10-KT or other fiscal year statements having FY.

role.label: Document Fiscal Year Focus
role.documentation: This is focus fiscal year of the document report in YYYY format. For a 2006 annual report, which may also provide financial information from prior periods, fiscal 2006 should be given as the fiscal year focus. Example: 2006.

role.label: Document Copyright Information
role.documentation: The copyright information for the document.

role.label: Document Name
role.documentation: Name of the document as assigned by the filer, corresponding to SEC document naming convention standards. Examples appear in the <FILENAME> field of EDGAR filings, such as 'htm_25911.htm', 'exhibit1.htm', 'v105727_8k.txt'.

role.label: Country Region
role.documentation: Region code of country

role.label: Entity Incorporation, State or Country Code
role.documentation: Two-character EDGAR code representing the state or country of incorporation.

role.label: Document Title
role.documentation: The name or title given to the document resource by the creator or publisher. An example is '2002 Annual Report'.

role.label: Amendment Flag
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true when the XBRL content amends previously-filed or accepted submission.

role.label: Current Fiscal Year End Date
role.documentation: End date of current fiscal year in the format --MM-DD.

role.label: Document Information [Table]
role.documentation: Container to support the formal attachment of each official or unofficial, public or private document as part of a submission package.

role.label: City Area Code
role.documentation: Area code of city

role.label: Document Synopsis
role.documentation: A synopsis or description of the document provided by the creator or publisher. Examples are 'This is the 2006 annual report for Company. During this period we saw revenue grow by 10% and earnings per share grow by 15% over the prior period'

role.label: Extension
role.documentation: Extension number for local phone number.

role.label: Entity Number of Employees
role.documentation: Number of persons employed by the Entity

role.label: Document Subtitle
role.documentation: The subtitle given to the document resource by the creator or publisher. An example is 'A New Period of Growth'.

role.label: Local Phone Number
role.documentation: Local phone number for entity.

role.label: Cover [Abstract]
role.documentation: Cover page.

role.label: Entity Listings, Exchange [Axis]
role.documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

role.label: Pre-Effective Amendment Number
role.documentation: Amendment number to registration statement under the Securities Act of 1933 before the registration becomes effective.

role.label: Former Fiscal Year End Date
role.documentation: Former end date of previous fiscal years

role.label: Entity Listings [Table]
role.documentation: Container for exchange listing information for an entity

role.label: Contained File Information, File Name
role.documentation: The name of the contained file.

role.label: Entities [Table]
role.documentation: Container to assemble all relevant information about each entity associated with the document instance

role.label: Contained File Information, File Type
role.documentation: The type or format of the contained file (usually XBRL but may be used for other types such as HTML, Word, PDF, GIF/JPG, etc.).

role.label: Entity Well-known Seasoned Issuer
role.documentation: Indicate 'Yes' or 'No' if the registrant is a well-known seasoned issuer, as defined in Rule 405 of the Securities Act. Is used on Form Type: 10-K, 10-Q, 8-K, 20-F, 6-K, 10-K/A, 10-Q/A, 20-F/A, 6-K/A, N-CSR, N-Q, N-1A.

role.label: Entity Bankruptcy Proceedings, Reporting Current
role.documentation: For registrants involved in bankruptcy proceedings during the preceding five years, the value Yes indicates that the registrant has filed all documents and reports required to be filed by Section 12, 13 or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 subsequent to the distribution of securities under a plan confirmed by a court; the value No indicates the registrant has not.  Registrants not involved in bankruptcy proceedings during the preceding five years should not report this element.

role.label: Contained File Information, File Description
role.documentation: The description of the contained file.

role.label: Contained File Information, File Number
role.documentation: The SEC Document Number of the contained file.
